EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for Reading Our Whitepaper. We Have More, You Know.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}}, Thanks for downloading a VMTurbo whitepaper. Tired of reading? This video says it all:
<http://bit.ly/1koFxv9>
VMTurbo has published numerous whitepapers <http://bit.ly/1koFBLr> (with more on the way), covering a broad range of topics that IT pros, like yourself, wrestle with today:
- Aligning Virtualization and Storage Management <http://bit.ly/1o5AJ1X> - Assuring Performance in VDI Deployments <http://bit.ly/1tWtj4v> - Business Continuity Assurance <http://bit.ly/1iz7wIV> - Capacity Management in the Cloud Era <http://bit.ly/1oCdXCw> - Successfully Virtualizing Business-Critical Applications <http://bit.ly/1lXlTaY>
... and many more.
If you're intrigued by what you've read, contact us for a demo <http://bit.ly/1prbRFy>. We can show you the magic in our environment, or yours.
Your IT control system, VMTurbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
